website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice for an efficient dual flush toilet for a budget-friendly price.
pros: Dual flush button is conveniently placed on top of the tank
Toilet comes in several sizes and shapes
Easy to install and set up in most home bathrooms
cons: The toilet holds less water in the small bowl than other regular toilet designs

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We, um, have a person in the house who tends to plug the toilet, and since we got this one, it hasn't happened once! Everything goes down every time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Balkcom

customer_reviews.title: Crapperific !
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted a 2 way toilet since I first saw one ten years ago. So far so good with this one. This toilet uses a fraction of the water of your old commode, and does a better job of it to boot. I love the choice of flush modes. Installed it myself in 1 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: John the backpacker

customer_reviews.title: Ring around the...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toilet except for the fact and I'm sorry to say, but because of the water efficiency, the water that suits in the bowl is too little. I have the problem of after pooping😁, it stains the walls constantly. Not enough water to cover the area where the poop would fall. Soooooo I don't know if I have an abnormally placed poop hole or I'm sitting on the toilet wrong, but I have to constantly clean the rim above the water level. Other than that, everything is beautiful. Awesome toilet. Love the dual flush and clean look.
customer_reviews.author: M. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool for a toilet.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool. It replaced a 45 year old American Standard toilet and the new unit is almost fun to use. Push the button and everything is gone. It only required some minor adjustments to eliminate some ghost flushing after it was installed. Since it uses so little water the tank refills almost immediately. We were so used hearing the water run from filling the old style tank we thought it might be broken. Very pleased with this unit and will probably purchase another when we remodel the second bath.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Non-traditional flush sound
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is more narrow that some, which is a bonus for a small bathroom/water closet. It works well and looks nice. I give it only three stars because it has a flush button on top of the tank (I prefer a handle on one side or the other so spare tp can be kept on the tank!) and, more imporantly, it makes a kind of clunk sound when it flushes that I’m not used to. I open the lid to make sure everything went down every time after I flush.
customer_reviews.author: Rubies481

customer_reviews.title: Zero Issues - Flushes like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a toilet that has 2 level flushing. After see the video of this toilet flush all the golf balls, we decided to install it in 2 bathrooms. We've been using them consistently for the past 7 months and have had zero issues with either toilet. I read reviews of people having issues with the buttons and needing to adjust them, we never had that problem with either toilet. We can use the #1 button for #2s and the toilet has no problem flushing it all down. We rarely ever use the #2 button. We paired it with the Brondell LumaWarm seat warmer. Fantastic toilet! We just bought 3 more for our new house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this a few weeks ago but only now installed it. This toilet is nice looking, comfortable and works well. The only 2 things not included in the kit were the wax seal and the seat. I looked around and could not find anything comparable to this American standard for the price. I'm very happy with this and will probably buy another unit for my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Handles chili-cheeseburgers without choking!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I was a child, I've always worried about an overflowing toilet. I can't be the only one right? So, I wanted to find something that could deal with six double bacon-chili-cheeseburgers without choking. This one handles your crap and leaves the bowl clean as a whistle. This white wonder never hesitates gobbling up all of your waste. I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: No lid/toilet seat, normal height for small children
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate purchase. The description states it is a “normal height” toilet. It is normal height for small children. I was not aware of this, but in the very fine print, it states that it does not come with a lid/toilet seat and that it must be purchased separately. Very strange.
customer_reviews.author: HIDouble

customer_reviews.title: Classy and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how the toilet looks and how it functions. It is quiet, saves water, flushes well and the water swirls around the sides keeping it cleaner than my previous toilet. My family loves how it flushes so easy and cool. I love having a classy and clean toilet that keeps itself cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: L8bloomer

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND COMFORT HEIGHT TOILET FOR EVERYONE
customer_reviews.text: This higher toilet is so much more comfortable than a regular sized toilet, especially for those who have had knee and hip replacement surgery. It’s not a problem for younger children either. We live it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine K.

customer_reviews.title: Always ship defect sets
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased two of those to replace my 20 year old toilets. One toilet bowl has a crack, I had to replace it. When the UPS guy came to pick up, he told me he only got one ticket, so he could only pick up one box. But the whole set comes in two boxes!!! That is not the end of the story, after I received the replacement set, and installed it, I found the top flush button is not working correctly. At this point, I can not remove the installed one and send it back! Damn!
customer_reviews.author: Ye

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After living in our home for 21 years, we decided to update our 1st floor bathroom. This is the toilet we decided we would install. I have to say this is a wonderful toilet. Gets rid of everything on the first flush!!!! And that is saying something as I have IBD. The old toilet was at least a 2 flusher. I can't say enough about this toilet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: I always thought toilets were all the same until...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and never thought I'd write a toilet review...But I've noticed this is a very quiet toilet. It seems to use a small amount of water too . I'd get this type again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a saver on water
customer_reviews.text: I have always had American Standard toilets. They are rated as one of the best. I got the higher one as we are getting older and it serves us great.
customer_reviews.author: Merle E. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: None of the parts that attach the tank to the bowl were in the package. So that was a trip to the hardware store to buy $10 worth of parts and make it work. There were also no instructions included. I found them on Internet was able to print them out but it was just one more hassle. other than that the toilet works well
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good toilet.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've had it at least 6 months now. I'll update the post again, but now I wish I had bought another for the other bathroom. I read about people's complaints, but we have had no issues with anyone using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Really like the taller seat on this toilet. No issues with the dual flush setup and install was straightforward (bought flange separately).
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Lower water bill
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is amazing. The savings alone make it worthwhile. Plus, its uber-easy to keep clean. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine K

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product and customer service. I've had three of these installed at various locations and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: F. PryorTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Love this toilet!
customer_reviews.text: The added height is very helpful. It seems to stay cleaner than my old one and I like how quickly and efficiently it flushes.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Mistral

customer_reviews.title: Tank/Base delivered separately and broken
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to warn potential buyers that my toilet was delivered in 2 packages 2 days apart. So initially I only received the tank, which was broken on arrival. It happens and I'm not upset which is why the 3 stars as I never got to try the toilet out.
customer_reviews.author: Casey R. Quenette

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was rough in the first try but second one arrived in good condition. Easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: aceduece

customer_reviews.title: Packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This toilet was impeccably packaged, arriving unbroken and perfect. For some reason it is nearly impossible to purchase a standard height toilet anymore,band already bought another brand which arrived unprotected and smashed. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zappala

customer_reviews.title: dual flush
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install for a single person. Looks good and Like the dual flush to save water.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Casey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Efficient and I love the choice of flushes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: mislead picture !! seat is not included another $42
customer_reviews.text: the toilet arrived in good condition and quality is a plus. But downside is not seat/cover included. Even though in this picture has shown all pieces. Anyway, still glad to have
customer_reviews.author: Cliff S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet
customer_reviews.text: Although a little expensive, the toilet functions as it should. Haven't had a clog yet. Height is good.
customer_reviews.author: DMWebb

customer_reviews.title: Product Works But Product Purchased Was Not Product Received
customer_reviews.text: Ordered white. Apparently, vendor did not have matching white top and bottom pieces. Somebody attempted to paint the top piece white using latex paint. They started on the inside and realized it would not work. Shipped mis-matched items anyway. Product works as advertised, but not sure I would trust the vendor if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: It came without a toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: I had to spend $100.00 dls more to have the installer come back with a toilet seat (cheap one) we only had in stock due to time constrain. Its not worth the hassle .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely efficient toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toilet. Installing in all my apartment units. Saves a lot on water bill
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet. Powerful flushing action with very low water ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Powerful flushing action with very low water consumption. Replaced two cheap Kohler units which were highly prone to clog with two of these, very happy with the performance
customer_reviews.author: Gschne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The tank and the toilet bowl were two different colors. After getting that straightened out with Amazon, and getting the toilet installed, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product, they are just the right height and very well made. the flushing action is great.
customer_reviews.author: alvin faunce

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the BEST. Has a powerful flush on both cycles. Tremendous water saver. If were possible, I would give this item a solid “10”
customer_reviews.author: Elton E. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Super quick tank refill
customer_reviews.text: Powerful small flush. Super quick tank refill so noise lasts only maybe 5 seconds. refill Clean lines.
customer_reviews.author: K. CONCANNON

customer_reviews.title: Got it broken
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled to get it, however it was broken. After reading some reviews we don't think this toilet or seller is worth the frustration and bother to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The toilet was shattered when we opened the box. We didn't open it immediately because we were finishing a remodel
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure you buy a seat
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks great. Bust disappointed that it doesn't come with a seat. The imagery says otherwise which I found misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ohlenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I have this toilet and decided to buy one as a gift for someone. I bought it because I like the dual flush feature but it arrived broken. I recommend buying directly from American Standard, not Amazon to avoid having to return it due to poor packaging
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace a crappy (pun intended) toilet recommended by Consumer Reports
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a crappy (pun intended) toilet recommended by Consumer Reports. I have put this one through the ringer without incident!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This dual flush works well. Other brands with dual ...
customer_reviews.text: This dual flush works well. Other brands with dual flush have never impressed me as being water-wise. This one definitely is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet, just remember to buy gaskets
customer_reviews.text: Nice toilet, it would be nice if it came with the tank to bowl gasket.
customer_reviews.author: Custer Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very good toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very good toilet, has excellent flush, easy to use dual buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Biker of the Apacolypse

customer_reviews.title: but I love this toilet
customer_reviews.text: This toilet replaced a vintage toilet, so maybe having a modern toilet is part of the reason for my excitement, but I love this toilet! It's compact and quiet. I've only had it a short time, but I'm very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: debkmsb

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality product
customer_reviews.text: The toilet was shipped & received promptly and was packaged very securely. The toilet appears to be a quality well made piece. The install was straightforward with no surprises. The toilet uses noticeably less water and so far functions as intended with no stoppages. The decision points for me in choosing this toilet versus others was that this one has a separate tank and the benefit of two different flush modes. With the notable added benefit that the higher flush mode is one of the lower water uses per flush of the toilets I found at the time.
customer_reviews.author: One old guy

customer_reviews.title: The tank appeared to be of quality construction
customer_reviews.text: The product itself reviews well but we only received the tank the first time. The tank appeared to be of quality construction but we had top cancel installation and will reschedule when we receive the complete product. It ships in 2 containers that require separate tracking numbers.
customer_reviews.author: RDL

customer_reviews.title: This is the first dual flush toilet I purchased and would buy it again and suggest it to others.
customer_reviews.text: Installation and set up was easy, toilet operated well I was pleased with everything, also purchased.the same brand slow close seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toilet. It's Smart looking cost-effective water saving and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: sherrilyn gregersen

customer_reviews.title: Toilet cracked
customer_reviews.text: My toilet cracked and is leaking after only a short period of time. Not sure what is going on with the quality of build. Need a new toilet now and I only bought this one a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Meera

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toilet. The size is good for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toilet. The size is good for everyone. I like the flushing buttons.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bosque

customer_reviews.title: Only the bowl =(
customer_reviews.text: They forget to tell you that it's not a complete toilet.... it's only the bowl and no tank.... for what they cost. I was expecting a complete toilet... I sent it back...
customer_reviews.author: kateyodie72

customer_reviews.title: I got the other half!
customer_reviews.text: Attempt #3... I got the bowl that those that only got the tank needed, but no tank. It was a pain to return it and I got no help from the vender. I bought one at Lowes for a better price. I bought the same model and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: zebu

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only received the tank part of the toilet... in other words i got nothing to show for my wait and the money i payed... i only got a box... a small f%#,@ box lol... what a joke
customer_reviews.author: Juan Macias

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 a toilet
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the bowl. I only received the tank
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY MIKE-NARD

product_meta.title: American Standard 2887218.020 H2Option Dual Flush Elongated 0.92/1.28 gpf Toilet, White
product_meta.description: Size:Normal Height| Style:Elongated| Color:WhiteH2Option - the greatest water efficiency gravity-flush toilets you can buy —you'll notice a difference with maximum water savings! The H2Option dual flush elongated toilet is ultra-high efficiency with a low gallons per flush rate allowing for both great performance and water conservation. Choose either a full or partial flush to save even more water.
feature_bullets: EverClean surface inhibits the growth of stain and odor-causing bacteria, mold, and mildew on the surface
Siphon jet bowl technology with PowerWash rim provides optimal UHET performance
Limited five year warranty on all mechanical parts
Dual flush 0.92/1.28 Gpf H2Option for maximum water savings
Ultra-High Efficiency Toilets (UHETs) meet EPA WaterSense and map premium criteria

specifications.Included Components: Toilet Bowl^Toilet Tank^color matched bolt caps
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited Lifetime Warranty on chinaware. Limited 5-year warranty on all mechanical parts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
